scripts.idl:sync: cp target/idl/ruma.json app/src/idl/ruma.json; cp target/types/ruma.ts app/src/types/ruma.ts
scripts.idl:init: anchor idl init $(anchor keys list | grep 'ruma:' | awk '{print $2}') -f target/idl/ruma.json --provider.cluster 'https://api.devnet.solana.com' --provider.wallet ruma-wallet.json
scripts.idl:upgrade: anchor idl upgrade $(anchor keys list | grep 'ruma:' | awk '{print $2}') -f target/idl/ruma.json --provider.cluster 'https://api.devnet.solana.com' --provider.wallet ruma-wallet.json
